original: Mossberg, Erans Gösta Ludvig, direktörsassistent, Norrköping, f. 5/4/99 i Arboga av major Gu&taf M. o. Betty Blom. G. 28 m. Dagny Tonsson. Barn: Hans f. 29, Lars 30. ’— Stud :€x. i Västerås 17, kansliex. i Upps. 21, dipl. fr. fakult. f. hand:- o. socialvetensk. v. univ. i Frankfurt a/M 23. Tj :man v. A-B P. Janson & Co. i Norrköp. 23-25, anst. i skeppsmäkl: firman A-B Aug. V. Svenson i Norrköp. i ol. befattn. sed. 26, dir :assis’t. där sed. 44. Rev. i Nya Ångbåts A-B Östern i Norrköp. Styr :led. i Vedcentralen i Norrköp. A-B. Stud:vist. i Tyskl. o. Erankr. 21-23.
translated: Mossberg, Erans Gösta Ludvig, director's assistant, Norrköping, b. 5/4/99 in Arboga, to Major Gustaf M. and Betty Blom. Married on 28 m. to Dagny Tonsson. Children: Hans b. 29, Lars b. 30. — Studied: exams in Västerås in 1917, clerk exams in Uppsala in 1921, diploma from the Faculty of Commerce and Social Sciences at the University in Frankfurt a/M in 1923. Worked for A-B P. Janson & Co. in Norrköping from 1923-1925, employed in the shipping broker firm A-B Aug. V. Svenson in Norrköping in various positions since 1926, director's assistant since 1944. Auditor in Nya Ångbåts A-B Östern in Norrköping. Board member of Vedcentralen in Norrköping A-B. Studied in Germany and France from 1921-1923.

education.credentialSubject: Faculty of Commerce and Social Sciences, University of Frankfurt a/M
